Articles.Content: Not really sure if this is the right place for it, but I guess it is development... anyway, what do people think about Squad's move to Curse for modding? Do you think its good or bad? In my opinion, I think that it was a bad shift. For me, it is a bit harder to navigate than the original spaceport, and also many community driven projects, or projects that were good but currently seem dead (i.e. B9 mod) will be lost in this shift. Anyway, what do you peoples think?

This isn' the right place because there's a thread already to discuss that.

Therefore, this one is closed.
